com.stockticker.persistence

Enum StockTickerPersistence

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<StockTickerPersistence>
      • com.stockticker.persistence.StockTickerPersistence
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PersistenceService, Serializable, Comparable<StockTickerPersistence>

    public enum StockTickerPersistence
extends Enum<StockTickerPersistence>
implements PersistenceService
    Provides services to query and update User and Stock data in the database
    Version:
    1.0 3/01/2014
    Author:
    Stuart Connall
    See Also:
    PersistenceService, PersistenceServiceException

        Specified by:

      • getTrackedStocks

                              throws PersistenceServiceException
        Returns a List of stock symbols being tracked by a specific user
        Specified by:
        getTrackedStocks in interface PersistenceService
        Parameters:
        username - name of user
        Returns:
        list of stock symbols
        Throws:
        PersistenceServiceException - is thrown when a database related error occurs in the Persistence Service component.

      • trackStock

        public boolean trackStock(String username,
                 String stock,
                 boolean track)
                   throws PersistenceServiceException
        Sets whether or not a stock is to be tracked
        Specified by:
        trackStock in interface PersistenceService
        Parameters:
        username - name of user
        stock - stock symbol to track
        track - true to track, false to un-track
        Returns:
        true or false
        Throws:
        PersistenceServiceException - is thrown when a database related error occurs in the Persistence Service component.

      • updateUser

        public boolean updateUser(User user)
                   throws PersistenceServiceException
        Updates the specified user's information. Proper usage of this method requires call getUser first to obtain a valid User instance.
        Specified by:
        updateUser in interface PersistenceService
        Parameters:
        user - a User object instance
        Returns:
        true if updated, false otherwise
        Throws:
        PersistenceServiceException - is thrown when a database related error occurs in the Persistence Service component.
